sections.heading: law.(RULLCA 106) The law of this state governs:(1) the internal affairs of a limited liability company; and(2) the liability of a member as member and a manager as manager for the debts, obligations, or other liabilities of a limited liability company

sections.text:
21-106.Governing law.

(RULLCA 106) The law of this state governs:

(1) the internal affairs of a limited liability company; and

(2) the liability of a member as member and a manager as manager for the debts, obligations, or other liabilities of a limited liability company.

SourceLaws 2010, LB888, ยง 6.
